content: 3 3 3 3 more sts from the underarm join for working in the round 50 53 54 59 64 68 74 79 85 sts work in st st for 6 6 6 6 6 4 4 4 4 rnds decrease round k1 k2tog k until 3 sts remain ssk k1 2 sts decrease d repeat decrease round every 6 6 6 6 6 6 6 5 4 rnds 2 3 3 4 4 4 4 5 7 more times 44 45 46 49 54 58 64 67 69 sts cont in st st until the sleeve measures 6 5 / 16 5 cm from underarm if you would like longer sleeves add length here remembering that this may add to yardage requirements note the ribbing will add 2 5 / 6 5 cm to the sleeve length cuff sizes 2 4 8 and 9 only work one more round decreasing one st as folls k1 k2tog k to end of round - 44 - 48 - - - 66 68 sts © sonder yarn co 2024 | www sonderyarnco com | for personal use only
